intro: Psychotria tubiflora, commonly known as the "Horned Psychotria," is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species with ornamental and medicinal value. Psychotria tubiflora is often cultivated in gardens for its visual interest and is also studied for its potential pharmacological properties.
